metadata.synopsis: Projection dialog acting as Sorcerous Sundries' clerk in case of Rolan's death. They are basically the  an automated calling system with prerecorded messages. He also has the ability to cast a portal to take players to the real Lorroakan.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Lorroakan's Projection in Sorcerous Sundries. He is only there if Rolan is dead.Location: BGO_Main_A: -1752; 26; 594

0.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
0.text: All services suspended until the current threat in Ramazith's Tower is neutralised. Have a magical day!

8.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
8.text: Welcome, dear patron, to Sorcerous Sundries.

58.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
58.text: It has come to my attention that there is a BITTER ADVENTURER located OUTSIDE the shop! Not to worry. We will quickly handle this disturbance for your comfort and safety.
58.context: NodeContext: Like an answering machine for a chain business or automated customer service bot where the words in all caps were added into the sentence separately

28.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
28.text: I am an un-person in service of the revered wizard Lorroakan, proprietor of this fine establishment.

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *Lorroakan's illusion is blissfully unaware of its caster's demise, but remains bound to its duties.*

12.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
12.text: To browse our wares, say 'TRADE'. To provide information about the Nightsong, say 'NIGHTSONG'.

51.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
51.text: If you are a city official here to collect dues, say 'TAXES'. For all other inquiries, say 'OTHER'.

67.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
67.text: The provision of information that leads to the retrieval of the Nightsong is worth a great deal to Master Lorroakan. Do you have information regarding the Nightsong?

54.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
54.text: Please proceed upstairs for further instructions.

29.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
29.text: Thank you! Please come again soon, and have a magical day!

45.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
45.text: Line of inquiry terminated. How else might I be of assistance?

61.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
61.text: This establishment's dues have been paid in full. See you soon, Mister Marvin Hudd.

14.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
14.text: Your request has been previously denied due to INCORRECT FACE.

35.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
35.text: Tax money has already been allotted for your personal use.

68.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
68.text: Your request has been previously denied due to POOR REASONING.

23.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
23.text: Tax money has already been donated for the purpose of this projection's self-preservation.

11.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
11.text: Your request has been previously denied due to INSUFFICIENT INTIMIDATION.

41.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
41.text: You are not Mister Marvin Hudd, the collections officer assigned to this establishment.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Looks like I have the wrong building. My apologies.

6.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
6.text: How else can I help you today?

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Trust me, your taxes will be put to better use in my hands.

56.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Projection hands off cash below screen.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Don't you recognise Marvin Hudd when you see him?

34.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
34.text: Forgive this error in my analysis. Hello Mister Marvin Hudd. Please find your payment in full.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Projection hands off cash below screen.

71.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
71.text: Until next we meet! Is there anything else I can help you with?

7.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
7.text: False. Please do not attempt to lie to Master Lorroakan's projection.
7.context: NodeContext: Could be funny to do 'Master Lorroakan' and then '-'s projection' almost as an aisde

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Fork over what you owe, or I'll crush your head.

27.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Projection hands off cash below screen.

15.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
15.text: To learn more about the search for the Nightsong, say 'NIGHTSONG'. To learn more about Master Lorroakan, say 'LORROAKAN'. To learn more about my good self, say 'PROJECTION'.

31.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
31.text: The Nightsong is a relic hidden in an underground temple beneath a settlement near the river Chionthar.

53.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
53.text: Master Lorroakan is offering a considerable sum for the object's retrieval.

33.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
33.text: To truly know Master Lorroakan is the work of a lifetime. Suffice it to say he is a powerful, important man whose powers exceed the limitations by which most wizards are constrained.

42.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
42.text: He resides in Ramazith's Tower. Anyone bearing information leading to the capture of the Nightsong may gain an audience with him.

43.speaker: Gale
43.text: The great and powerful Lorroakan, offering our humble group an audience? We are honoured.
43.context: NodeContext: Dripping with sarcasm - Gale doesn't think much of Lorroakan

70.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
70.text: I am the product of an ingenious bit of magic performed by Master Lorroakan. I am blessed with sufficient intelligence to adequately run and protect this shop, Sorcerous Sundries.

16.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
16.text: Because Master Lorroakan is engaged in important work, I take care of such banalities as speaking with customers.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: Hold on - you said you're an un-person? What's that?

49.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
49.text: I'm sorry. I didn't understand your query.

47.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
47.text: Welcome back to Sorcerous Sundries! How can I help you?
